title: Adobe AdCloud Search Ad Performance Report Full Extension
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Ad Performance Report Full Extension. Contains all Solution added fields.

xdm:accountId.title: Search Engine Account ID
xdm:accountId.description: Unique identifier for the account this event is associated to.

xdm:campaignId.title: Search Engine Campaign ID
xdm:campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the campaign which this event is associated to.

xdm:adgroupId.title: Search Engine AdGroup ID
xdm:adgroupId.description: Unique identifier for the adgroup which this event is associated to.

xdm:adId.title: Ad ID
xdm:adId.description: Unique identifier for the ad or creative which this event is associated to.

xdm:clientId.title: Internal Advertiser or User ID
xdm:clientId.description: Unique identifier for the advertiser which this event is associated to.

xdm:networkId.title: Search Engine ID
xdm:networkId.description: Unique identifier for the Search Engine which this event is associated to.

xdm:adMeasures.title: Adobe Ad Cloud Search Ad Performance Measure Custom Fields
